name: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial
description: These words by President Franklin Delano Roosevelt ushered the United States into World War II and defined what it is to be an American. Stop by this secluded memorial and begin to understand the Roosevelt legacy.
shortDescription: These words by President Franklin Delano Roosevelt ushered the United States into World War II and defined what it is to be an American. Stop by this secluded memorial and begin to understand the Roos...

operatingHours.description: There are no Rangers on duty at this site (except for special events). The United States Park Police are on duty 24 hours a day.

climate.weatherDescription: Washington DC gets to see all four seasons. Humidity will make the temps feel hotter in summer and colder in winter. Spring (March - May) Temp: Average high is 65.5 degrees with a low of 46.5 degrees Summer (June - August) Temp: Average high is 86 degrees with a low of 68.5 degrees Fall (September - November) Temp: Average high is 68 degrees with a low of 51.5 degrees Winter (December - February) Temp: Average high is 45 degrees with a low of 30 degrees (Source: www.usclimatedata.com)

images.title: Franklin Delano Roosevelt
images.altText: Picture of FDR in a wheel chair within his memorial
images.caption: From Adversity to Presidency

images.title: Statue of Eleanor Roosevelt
images.caption: Statue of First Lady and US Delegate to the US, Eleanor Roosevelt is found within the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial

images.title: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Statue Face
images.altText: An up-close photo of Franklin Delano Roosevelt Face
images.caption: An up-close photo of Franklin Delano Roosevelt's face located in Room 3

images.title: Cascade at Franklin Delano Roosevelt
images.altText: A four tier cascade of water flows
images.caption: One of five main water features located in Room 2 at Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial

images.title: Aerial View of Franklin Delano Roosevelt during Cherry Blossom
images.altText: Vivid pink colors surround the Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial
images.caption: Franklin Delano Roosevelt Memorial during Japanese Cherry Blossom peak bloom time
